amendment.description: To more quickly resolve rape cases and reduce the deficit by consolidating unnecessary duplication within the Department of Justice.

vote.text: Amendment SA 15 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 17.
